trans-unit.source: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce funzioni di conversione numerosi ed espone un GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe fornisce funzioni di conversione numerosi ed espone inoltre un GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che durante il rendering come Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), uso del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>dell'oggetto per il disegno personalizzato non saranno incluso come parte del documento SVG.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note also that, by default, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> functions usually take absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che, per impostazione predefinita, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>funzioni accettano in genere le coordinate assolute.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: I metodi di conversione di questa classe devono pertanto essere utili se si eseguono operazioni di disegno.

trans-unit.source: A ChartGraphics object is exposed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto ChartGraphics è esposto nel <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs>classe? qualifyHint = False / autoUpgrade = True, il che rende più semplice eseguire il disegno personalizzato nel <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>eventi.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se vengono apportate modifiche significative al comportamento predefinito del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>dell'oggetto, l'immagine del grafico e gli elementi associati possono essere disegnati in modo errato.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, positioning may be altered.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il posizionamento può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile che sia esperti di GDI+ prima di apportare modifiche significative alle proprietà del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia non gestite e, facoltativamente, le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> dell'oggetto e converte le coordinate relative in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> dell'oggetto e converte le coordinate relative in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto che utilizza le coordinate relative e restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto che utilizza coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Takes a given axis value for a specified axis and returns the relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un valore dell'asse per un asse specificato e restituisce il valore in pixel relativo.

trans-unit.source: Chart area name.
trans-unit.target: Nome dell'area grafico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"></xref> enumeration value that identifies the relevant axis.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che identifica l'asse pertinente.

trans-unit.source: The axis value to be converted to a relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'asse da convertire in un valore in pixel relativo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the converted axis value, in relative pixel coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta il valore convertito dell'asse, in pixel relativo coordinate.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> oggetto che utilizza coordinate assolute e restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> oggetto che utilizza le coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that is using absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struttura che utilizza coordinate assolute e restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> oggetto che utilizza le coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struttura in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struttura in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto in assoluto coordinate e restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto che utilizza le coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> oggetto in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that can be used for drawing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un oggetto GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto che può essere utilizzato ai fini del disegno.

trans-unit.source: You can use this object property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà dell'oggetto per eseguire un disegno personalizzato che può essere eseguita mediante GDI+.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per il disegno.
